证据片段: The Canadian Deuterium Uranium (CANDU) reactor has an enviable record of performance. Based on lifetime capacity factors to 31 Dec. 1987 for reactors over $5 0 0 \ \mathrm { M W e }$ , the first three were CANDU while six CANDU reactors ranked in the top ten.
